headline: Packaging Corporation of America (PKG): Reassessing Valuation After Box Demand Weakness and Wallula Mill Shutdown
summary: Packaging Corporation of America (PKG) is juggling two big storylines right now: softer industry demand for boxes and a plan to permanently shut major capacity at its Wallula, Washington mill. See our latest analysis for Packaging Corporation of America. Those demand worries and the Wallula downsizing have clearly weighed on sentiment, with the share price recently sliding and contributing to a weaker year to date share price return. This comes even though the three and five year total...
